scripts.test: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:golden:byteequal
scripts.test:golden:byteequal: pnpm -r --filter ./packages/* --if-present run build && pnpm -r --filter ./apps/cli run build && node tools/run-golden-tests.mjs
scripts.test:cli:ffmpeg: pnpm -r --filter ./packages/* --if-present run build && pnpm -r --filter ./apps/cli run build && node tools/run-golden-tests.mjs --structure-only --resampler ffmpeg
scripts.publish:dry-run: mkdir -p out/publish-dryruns && pnpm -r --filter ./apps/cli exec npm publish --dry-run > out/publish-dryruns/cli.txt 2>&1
